Package org.bff.javampd.album

Interface AlbumDatabase

All Known Implementing Classes:
MPDAlbumDatabase
public interface AlbumDatabase
Database for artist related items
Author:
bill

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Collection<MPDAlbum>
    findAlbum(String albumName)
    Returns a list of MPDAlbums for the album name.
    Collection<MPDAlbum>
    listAlbumsByAlbumArtist(MPDArtist albumArtist)
    Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums by an album artist.
    Collection<MPDAlbum>
    listAlbumsByArtist(MPDArtist artist)
    Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums by a particular artist.
    Collection<MPDAlbum>
    listAlbumsByGenre(MPDGenre genre)
    Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums by a particular genre.
    Collection<MPDAlbum>
    listAlbumsByYear(String year)
    Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums for a particular year.
    Collection<String>
    listAllAlbumNames()
    Returns a list of album names.
    Collection<MPDAlbum>
    listAllAlbums()
    Returns a list of all MPDAlbums.

  • Method Details

    • listAlbumsByGenre

      Collection<MPDAlbum> listAlbumsByGenre(MPDGenre genre)
      Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums by a particular genre.
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre to find albums
      Returns:
      a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums

    • listAlbumsByYear

      Collection<MPDAlbum> listAlbumsByYear(String year)
      Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums for a particular year.
      Parameters:
      year - the year to find albums
      Returns:
      a Collection of MPDAlbums of all years

    • listAlbumsByArtist

      Collection<MPDAlbum> listAlbumsByArtist(MPDArtist artist)
      Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums by a particular artist.
      Parameters:
      artist - the artist to find albums
      Returns:
      a Collection of MPDAlbums by the MPDArtist

    • listAlbumsByAlbumArtist

      Collection<MPDAlbum> listAlbumsByAlbumArtist(MPDArtist albumArtist)
      Returns a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums by an album artist. An album artist denotes the artist for a musical release, as distinct from artists for the tracks that constitute a release
      Parameters:
      albumArtist - the album artist to find albums
      Returns:
      a Collection of MPDAlbums by the MPDArtist

    • listAllAlbumNames

      Collection<String> listAllAlbumNames()
      Returns a list of album names. To hydrate the MPDAlbum call #findAlbum(String). This method will return an empty string album name if one exists in your collection.
      Returns:
      a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums

    • listAllAlbums

      Collection<MPDAlbum> listAllAlbums()
      Returns a list of all MPDAlbums. This could be very slow for large collections.
      Returns:
      a Collection of MPDAlbums of all albums

    • findAlbum

      Collection<MPDAlbum> findAlbum(String albumName)
      Returns a list of MPDAlbums for the album name.
      Parameters:
      albumName - the album's name
      Returns:
      a Collection of MPDAlbums
